class.name: SGFixed
class.brief_description: A singleton with utility functions for working with fixed-point numbers and data types.
class.description: SG Physics 2D represents fixed-point numbers using the int type. Fixed-point numbers can be added or subtracted normally (ex. [code]a + b[/code]) but most other math operations need to be done using the math functions found here.

method.name: acos
method.description: Returns the arc cosine of the fixed-point number [code]fixed_value[/code] in radians (fixed-point).

method.name: asin
method.description: Returns the arc sine of the fixed-point number [code]fixed_value[/code] in radians (fixed-point)..

method.name: atan
method.description: Returns the arc tangent of the fixed-point number [code]fixed_value[/code] in radians (fixed-point)..

method.name: atan2
method.description: Returns the arc tangent of [code]y/x[code] (fixed-point numbers) in radians (fixed-point).

method.name: ceil
method.description: Returns the [code]fixed_value[/code] without the decimals, rounded up.

method.name: cos
method.description: Returns the cosine of the fixed-point number [code]fixed_value[/code] in radians (fixed-point).

method.name: deg2rad
method.description: Fixed-point conversion of degree angles into radian angles

method.name: div
method.description: Return the result of dividing the fixed-point numbers [code]fixed_one[/code] divided by [code]fixed_two[/code].

method.name: div_rounded
method.description: Return the result of dividing the fixed-point numbers [code]fixed_one[/code] divided by [code]fixed_two[/code], but rounding the result to the nearest value instead of returning the integer division quotient.

method.name: floor
method.description: Returns the [code]fixed_value[/code] without the decimals, rounded down.

method.name: format_string
method.description: Formats a fixed-point number into a string.

method.name: from_float
method.description: Converts a float into a fixed-point number. [b]Note:[/b] Don't use this in gameplay code! Whereever possible do all gameplay math in fixed-point numbers.

method.name: from_float_rect2
method.description: Converts a [Rect2] into an [SGFixedRect2]. [b]Note:[/b] Don't use this in gameplay code! Whereever possible do all gameplay math in fixed-point numbers.

method.name: from_float_vector2
method.description: Converts a [Vector2] into an [SGFixedVector2]. [b]Note:[/b] Don't use this in gameplay code! Whereever possible do all gameplay math in fixed-point numbers.

method.name: from_int
method.description: Converts a normal integer into a fixed-point number.

method.name: from_string
method.description: Parses a String into a fixed-point number. [b]Note:[/b] string_value must represent number (decimal or not). If it isn't a valid number then it will return 0

method.name: log
method.description: Natural logarithm using fixed-point math.

method.name: mul
method.description: Returns the result of multiplying two fixed-point numbers.

method.name: pow
method.description: Returns the result of computing base to the power of exp. [b]Note:[/b] While fractional and negative exponents are supported, applying pow() with a negative base and a fractional exponent is not supported.

method.name: rad2deg
method.description: Fixed-point conversion of radian angles into degree angles

method.name: rect2
method.description: Constructs an [SGFixedRect2].

method.name: round
method.description: Returns the [code]fixed_value[/code] without the decimals, rounded down if the decimal is lower than [code]SGFixed.HALF[/code], rounded up otherwise.

method.name: sin
method.description: Returns the sine of the fixed-point number [code]fixed_value[/code] in radians (fixed-point).

method.name: sqrt
method.description: Returns the square root of a fixed-point number.

method.name: tan
method.description: Returns the tangent of the fixed-point number [code]fixed_value[/code] in radians (fixed-point).

method.name: to_float
method.description: Converts a fixed-point number into a float.

method.name: to_int
method.description: Converts a fixed-point number into a normal int.

method.name: transform2d
method.description: Constructs an [SGFixedTransform2D].

method.name: vector2
method.description: Constructs an [SGFixedVector2].
